sentences.en: A silver vase stood on the mantelpiece.
sentences.cn: 一只银质花瓶摆放在壁炉台上.

sentences.en: Don't stub your cigarettes out on my mantelpiece!
sentences.cn: 别在我的壁炉台上按灭烟头.

sentences.en: Estelle kept a photograph of her mother in a silver frame on the kitchen mantelpiece.
sentences.cn: 埃丝特尔把母亲的一张镶银框的照片挂在厨房壁炉台上。

sentences.en: Everything in that drawing - room was in key with that mantelpiece.
sentences.cn: 客厅里所有的东西都和那个壁炉台相协调.

sentences.en: He noticed that the clock on the mantelpiece said nine, meaning twenty - one.
sentences.cn: 他注意到壁炉架上的座钟已是九点了, 那就是说二十一点.

sentences.en: His darts trophy takes pride of place on mantelpiece.
sentences.cn: 他将掷镖奖杯放在壁炉台上最显著的位置.

sentences.en: His darts trophy takes pride of place on the mantelpiece.
sentences.cn: 他将掷镖奖杯放在壁炉顶上最显著的地方.

sentences.en: I heard him knock his pipe out on the mantelpiece.
sentences.cn: 我听见他在壁炉架上磕打烟斗.

sentences.en: I heard him knock out his pipe on the mantelpiece.
sentences.cn: 我听到他在壁炉上敲出烟灰的声音.

sentences.en: It had gone from the mantelpiece.
sentences.cn: 它已经不在壁炉台上了.

sentences.en: On the mantelpiece are a pair of bronze Ming vases.
sentences.cn: 壁炉台上是一对明代的青铜花瓶。

sentences.en: She ould hear the clock ticking away on the mantelpiece.
sentences.cn: 她可以听见壁炉架上的时钟滴滴答答走过的声音.

sentences.en: That's a mantelpiece cluttered up with all kinds of doodad.
sentences.cn: 那是个摆满了各种小玩意儿的壁炉架.

sentences.en: The clock on the mantelpiece struck 10.
sentences.cn: 炉台上的钟敲响了十点。

sentences.en: The clock on the mantelpiece ticked away loudly in the stillness.
sentences.cn: 壁炉架上的钟表寂静中滴滴答答的声音很大.

trans.tran_en: a wooden or stone shelf which is the top part of a frame surrounding a  fireplace
